messages.title: Helping Hard Working Families
messages.content: Despite the progress we have made over the last decade there is now a big choice ahead as we face the challenges of securing the recovery from the global recession.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support Sure Start to expand and improve childcare services and resist Tory cuts.
Pledge to fight for local services and work towards eradicating poverty.
Advocate for pension credit, free bus travel, and winter fuel allowances; oppose Tory cuts and support a National Care Service.

issues.socialWelfare: Fight for local services and put the needs of local people and key frontline services ahead of tackling budget deficits. Proud of the record of tackling poverty & justice for the poorest.

leaflet.personalStatement: Andy is approachable and principled and understands our local needs.

politicalExperience.role: YOUR LABOUR AND CO-OP CANDIDATE FOR LOUGHBOROUGH
politicalExperience.achievements: Raised locally, chose to raise my own family here. Have fought for justice on the issues and passion for education and equality concerns.

endorsements.endorsement: Impressed by Andy Reed, his integrity and hard work as an MP. Joined the Labour Party to support him, he needs your support too.
